ChannelAccount.description: Channel account information needed to route a message
ChannelAccount.title: ChannelAccount

id.description:
Channel id for the user or bot on this channel (Example: joe@smith.com, or @joesmith or
123456)
id.title: id

aadObjectId.description: This account's object ID within Azure Active Directory (AAD)
aadObjectId.title: aadObjectId

role.description:
Role of the entity behind the account (Example: User, Bot, etc.). Possible values include:
'user', 'bot'
role.title: role

ConversationAccount.description: Channel account information for a conversation
ConversationAccount.title: ConversationAccount

isGroup.description:
Indicates whether the conversation contains more than two participants at the time the
activity was generated
isGroup.title: isGroup

conversationType.description: Indicates the type of the conversation in channels that distinguish between conversation types
conversationType.title: conversationType

id.description:
Channel id for the user or bot on this channel (Example: joe@smith.com, or @joesmith or
123456)
id.title: id

aadObjectId.description: This account's object ID within Azure Active Directory (AAD)
aadObjectId.title: aadObjectId

role.description:
Role of the entity behind the account (Example: User, Bot, etc.). Possible values include:
'user', 'bot'
role.title: role

type.description: Message reaction type. Possible values include: 'like', 'plusOne'
type.title: type

type.description:
The type of action implemented by this button. Possible values include: 'openUrl', 'imBack',
'postBack', 'playAudio', 'playVideo', 'showImage', 'downloadFile', 'signin', 'call',
'payment', 'messageBack'
type.title: type

title.description: Text description which appears on the button
title.title: title

image.description: Image URL which will appear on the button, next to text label
image.title: image

displayText.description: (Optional) text to display in the chat feed if the button is clicked
displayText.title: displayText

value.description: Supplementary parameter for action. Content of this property depends on the ActionType
value.title: value

channelData.description: Channel-specific data associated with this action
channelData.title: channelData

to.description:
Ids of the recipients that the actions should be shown to.  These Ids are relative to the
channelId and a subset of all recipients of the activity
to.title: to

actions.description: Actions that can be shown to the user
actions.title: actions

Entity.description: Metadata object pertaining to an activity
Entity.title: Entity

ConversationReference.description: An object relating to a particular point in a conversation
ConversationReference.title: ConversationReference

activityId.description: (Optional) ID of the activity to refer to
activityId.title: activityId

serviceUrl.description: Service endpoint where operations concerning the referenced conversation may be performed
serviceUrl.title: serviceUrl

TextHighlight.description: Refers to a substring of content within another field
TextHighlight.title: TextHighlight

text.description: Defines the snippet of text to highlight
text.title: text

occurrence.description: Occurrence of the text field within the referenced text, if multiple exist.
occurrence.title: occurrence

SemanticAction.description: Represents a reference to a programmatic action
SemanticAction.title: SemanticAction

Activity.description: An Activity is the basic communication type for the Bot Framework 3.0 protocol.
Activity.title: Activity

type.description:
Contains the activity type. Possible values include: 'message', 'contactRelationUpdate',
'conversationUpdate', 'typing', 'endOfConversation', 'event', 'invoke', 'deleteUserData',
'messageUpdate', 'messageDelete', 'installationUpdate', 'messageReaction', 'suggestion',
'trace', 'handoff'
type.title: type

id.description: Contains an ID that uniquely identifies the activity on the channel.
id.title: id

timestamp.description: Contains the date and time that the message was sent, in UTC, expressed in ISO-8601 format.
timestamp.title: timestamp

localTimestamp.description:
Contains the date and time that the message was sent, in local time, expressed in ISO-8601
format.
For example, 2016-09-23T13:07:49.4714686-07:00.
localTimestamp.title: localTimestamp

localTimezone.description:
Contains the name of the timezone in which the message, in local time, expressed in IANA Time
Zone database format.
For example, America/Los_Angeles.
localTimezone.title: localTimezone

serviceUrl.description: Contains the URL that specifies the channel's service endpoint. Set by the channel.
serviceUrl.title: serviceUrl

channelId.description: Contains an ID that uniquely identifies the channel. Set by the channel.
channelId.title: channelId

from.description: Identifies the sender of the message.
from.title: from

conversation.description: Identifies the conversation to which the activity belongs.
conversation.title: conversation

recipient.description: Identifies the recipient of the message.
recipient.title: recipient

textFormat.description: Format of text fields Default:markdown. Possible values include: 'markdown', 'plain', 'xml'
textFormat.title: textFormat

attachmentLayout.description:
The layout hint for multiple attachments. Default: list. Possible values include: 'list',
'carousel'
attachmentLayout.title: attachmentLayout

membersAdded.description: The collection of members added to the conversation.
membersAdded.title: membersAdded

membersRemoved.description: The collection of members removed from the conversation.
membersRemoved.title: membersRemoved

reactionsAdded.description: The collection of reactions added to the conversation.
reactionsAdded.title: reactionsAdded

reactionsRemoved.description: The collection of reactions removed from the conversation.
reactionsRemoved.title: reactionsRemoved

topicName.description: The updated topic name of the conversation.
topicName.title: topicName

historyDisclosed.description: Indicates whether the prior history of the channel is disclosed.
historyDisclosed.title: historyDisclosed

locale.description:
A locale name for the contents of the text field.
The locale name is a combination of an ISO 639 two- or three-letter culture code associated
with a language
and an ISO 3166 two-letter subculture code associated with a country or region.
The locale name can also correspond to a valid BCP-47 language tag.
locale.title: locale

text.description: The text content of the message.
text.title: text

inputHint.description:
Indicates whether your bot is accepting,
expecting, or ignoring user input after the message is delivered to the client. Possible
values include: 'acceptingInput', 'ignoringInput', 'expectingInput'
inputHint.title: inputHint

summary.description: The text to display if the channel cannot render cards.
summary.title: summary

suggestedActions.description: The suggested actions for the activity.
suggestedActions.title: suggestedActions

entities.description: Represents the entities that were mentioned in the message.
entities.title: entities

action.description:
Indicates whether the recipient of a contactRelationUpdate was added or removed from the
sender's contact list.
action.title: action

replyToId.description: Contains the ID of the message to which this message is a reply.
replyToId.title: replyToId

label.description: A descriptive label for the activity.
label.title: label

valueType.description: The type of the activity's value object.
valueType.title: valueType

value.description: A value that is associated with the activity.
value.title: value

name.description: The name of the operation associated with an invoke or event activity.
name.title: name

relatesTo.description: A reference to another conversation or activity.
relatesTo.title: relatesTo

code.description:
The a code for endOfConversation activities that indicates why the conversation ended.
Possible values include: 'unknown', 'completedSuccessfully', 'userCancelled', 'botTimedOut',
'botIssuedInvalidMessage', 'channelFailed'
code.title: code

expiration.description:
The time at which the activity should be considered to be "expired" and should not be
presented to the recipient.
expiration.title: expiration

importance.description: The importance of the activity. Possible values include: 'low', 'normal', 'high'
importance.title: importance

deliveryMode.description:
A delivery hint to signal to the recipient alternate delivery paths for the activity.
The default delivery mode is "default". Possible values include: 'normal', 'notification'
deliveryMode.title: deliveryMode

listenFor.description: List of phrases and references that speech and language priming systems should listen for
listenFor.title: listenFor

textHighlights.description: The collection of text fragments to highlight when the activity contains a ReplyToId value.
textHighlights.title: textHighlights

semanticAction.description: An optional programmatic action accompanying this request
semanticAction.title: semanticAction

ConversationParameters.description: Parameters for creating a new conversation
ConversationParameters.title: ConversationParameters

bot.description: The bot address for this conversation
bot.title: bot

members.description: Members to add to the conversation
members.title: members

topicName.description: (Optional) Topic of the conversation (if supported by the channel)
topicName.title: topicName

activity.description:
(Optional) When creating a new conversation, use this activity as the initial message to the
conversation
activity.title: activity

channelData.description: Channel specific payload for creating the conversation
channelData.title: channelData

serviceUrl.description: Service endpoint where operations concerning the conversation may be performed
serviceUrl.title: serviceUrl

members.description: List of members in this conversation
members.title: members

ResourceResponse.description: A response containing a resource ID
ResourceResponse.title: ResourceResponse

activities.description: A collection of Activities that conforms to the Transcript schema.
activities.title: activities

url.description: URL thumbnail image for major content property
url.title: url

alt.description: Image description intended for screen readers
alt.title: alt

HeroCard.description: A Hero card (card with a single, large image)
HeroCard.title: HeroCard

images.description: Array of images for the card
images.title: images

buttons.description: Set of actions applicable to the current card
buttons.title: buttons

tap.description: This action will be activated when user taps on the card itself
tap.title: tap

url.description: URL pointing to the thumbnail to use for media content
url.title: url

alt.description: HTML alt text to include on this thumbnail image
alt.title: alt

profile.description: Optional profile hint to the client to differentiate multiple MediaUrl objects from each other
profile.title: profile

AnimationCard.description: An animation card (Ex: gif or short video clip)
AnimationCard.title: AnimationCard

media.description:
Media URLs for this card. When this field contains more than one URL, each URL is an
alternative format of the same content.
media.title: media

shareable.description: This content may be shared with others (default:true)
shareable.title: shareable

autoloop.description: Should the client loop playback at end of content (default:true)
autoloop.title: autoloop

autostart.description: Should the client automatically start playback of media in this card (default:true)
autostart.title: autostart

aspect.description: Aspect ratio of thumbnail/media placeholder. Allowed values are "16:9" and "4:3"
aspect.title: aspect

duration.description:
Describes the length of the media content without requiring a receiver to open the content.
Formatted as an ISO 8601 Duration field.
duration.title: duration

Media URLs for this card. When this field contains more than one URL, each URL is an
alternative format of the same content.

Media URLs for this card. When this field contains more than one URL, each URL is an
alternative format of the same content.
media.title: media

shareable.description: This content may be shared with others (default:true)
shareable.title: shareable

autoloop.description: Should the client loop playback at end of content (default:true)
autoloop.title: autoloop

autostart.description: Should the client automatically start playback of media in this card (default:true)
autostart.title: autostart

aspect.title: aspect

duration.description:
Describes the length of the media content without requiring a receiver to open the content.
Formatted as an ISO 8601 Duration field.
duration.title: duration

Fact.description:
Set of key-value pairs. Advantage of this section is that key and value properties will be
rendered with default style information with some delimiter between them. So there is no need
for developer to specify style information.
Fact.title: Fact

ReceiptItem.description: An item on a receipt card
ReceiptItem.title: ReceiptItem

subtitle.description: Subtitle appears just below Title field, differs from Title in font styling only
subtitle.title: subtitle

text.description: Text field appears just below subtitle, differs from Subtitle in font styling only
text.title: text

quantity.description: Number of items of given kind
quantity.title: quantity

tap.description: This action will be activated when user taps on the Item bubble.
tap.title: tap

tap.description: This action will be activated when user taps on the card
tap.title: tap

total.description: Total amount of money paid (or to be paid)
total.title: total

tax.description: Total amount of tax paid (or to be paid)
tax.title: tax

vat.description: Total amount of VAT paid (or to be paid)
vat.title: vat

buttons.description: Set of actions applicable to the current card
buttons.title: buttons

SigninCard.description: A card representing a request to sign in
SigninCard.title: SigninCard

buttons.description: Action to use to perform signin
buttons.title: buttons

OAuthCard.description: A card representing a request to perform a sign in via OAuth
OAuthCard.title: OAuthCard

connectionName.description: The name of the registered connection
connectionName.title: connectionName

buttons.description: Action to use to perform signin
buttons.title: buttons

ThumbnailCard.description: A thumbnail card (card with a single, small thumbnail image)
ThumbnailCard.title: ThumbnailCard

images.description: Array of images for the card
images.title: images

buttons.description: Set of actions applicable to the current card
buttons.title: buttons

tap.description: This action will be activated when user taps on the card itself
tap.title: tap

media.description:
Media URLs for this card. When this field contains more than one URL, each URL is an
alternative format of the same content.
media.title: media

shareable.description: This content may be shared with others (default:true)
shareable.title: shareable

autoloop.description: Should the client loop playback at end of content (default:true)
autoloop.title: autoloop

autostart.description: Should the client automatically start playback of media in this card (default:true)
autostart.title: autostart

aspect.description: Aspect ratio of thumbnail/media placeholder. Allowed values are "16:9" and "4:3"
aspect.title: aspect

duration.description:
Describes the length of the media content without requiring a receiver to open the content.
Formatted as an ISO 8601 Duration field.
duration.title: duration

text.description: Sub Text which represents the mention (can be null or empty)
text.title: text

address.description: Address of the place (may be `string` or complex object of type `PostalAddress`)
address.title: address

geo.description: Geo coordinates of the place (may be complex object of type `GeoCoordinates` or `GeoShape`)
geo.title: geo

hasMap.description: Map to the place (may be `string` (URL) or complex object of type `Map`)
hasMap.title: hasMap

cardValue.description: Callback parameter specified in the Value field of the MediaCard that originated this event
cardValue.title: cardValue

TokenRequest.description: A request to receive a user token
TokenRequest.title: TokenRequest

provider.description: The provider to request a user token from
provider.title: provider

settings.description: A collection of settings for the specific provider for this request
settings.title: settings

TokenResponse.description: A response that includes a user token
TokenResponse.title: TokenResponse

expiration.description: Expiration for the token, in ISO 8601 format (e.g. "2007-04-05T14:30Z")
expiration.title: expiration

MicrosoftPayMethodData.description: W3C Payment Method Data for Microsoft Pay
MicrosoftPayMethodData.title: MicrosoftPayMethodData

country.description: This is the CLDR (Common Locale Data Repository) region code. For example, US, GB, CN, or JP
country.title: country

addressLine.description:
This is the most specific part of the address. It can include, for example, a street name, a
house number, apartment number, a rural delivery route, descriptive instructions, or a post
office box number.
addressLine.title: addressLine

region.description:
This is the top level administrative subdivision of the country. For example, this can be a
state, a province, an oblast, or a prefecture.
region.title: region

city.description: This is the city/town portion of the address.
city.title: city

dependentLocality.description:
This is the dependent locality or sublocality within a city. For example, used for
neighborhoods, boroughs, districts, or UK dependent localities.
dependentLocality.title: dependentLocality

postalCode.description: This is the postal code or ZIP code, also known as PIN code in India.
postalCode.title: postalCode

sortingCode.description: This is the sorting code as used in, for example, France.
sortingCode.title: sortingCode

languageCode.description:
This is the BCP-47 language code for the address. It's used to determine the field separators
and the order of fields when formatting the address for display.
languageCode.title: languageCode

organization.description: This is the organization, firm, company, or institution at this address.
organization.title: organization

recipient.description: This is the name of the recipient or contact person.
recipient.title: recipient

phone.description: This is the phone number of the recipient or contact person.
phone.title: phone

PaymentItem.description: Indicates what the payment request is for and the value asked for
PaymentItem.title: PaymentItem

pending.description: When set to true this flag means that the amount field is not final.
pending.title: pending

id.description: String identifier used to reference this PaymentShippingOption
id.title: id

amount.description: Contains the monetary amount for the item
amount.title: amount

selected.description: Indicates whether this is the default selected PaymentShippingOption
selected.title: selected

PaymentDetailsModifier.description: Provides details that modify the PaymentDetails based on payment method identifier
PaymentDetailsModifier.title: PaymentDetailsModifier

supportedMethods.description: Contains a sequence of payment method identifiers
supportedMethods.title: supportedMethods

total.description:
This value overrides the total field in the PaymentDetails dictionary for the payment method
identifiers in the supportedMethods field
total.title: total

additionalDisplayItems.description:
Provides additional display items that are appended to the displayItems field in the
PaymentDetails dictionary for the payment method identifiers in the supportedMethods field
additionalDisplayItems.title: additionalDisplayItems

data.description:
A JSON-serializable object that provides optional information that might be needed by the
supported payment methods
data.title: data

PaymentDetails.description: Provides information about the requested transaction
PaymentDetails.title: PaymentDetails

total.description: Contains the total amount of the payment request
total.title: total

displayItems.description: Contains line items for the payment request that the user agent may display
displayItems.title: displayItems

shippingOptions.description: A sequence containing the different shipping options for the user to choose from
shippingOptions.title: shippingOptions

modifiers.description: Contains modifiers for particular payment method identifiers
modifiers.title: modifiers

PaymentMethodData.description:
Indicates a set of supported payment methods and any associated payment method specific data for
those methods
PaymentMethodData.title: PaymentMethodData

supportedMethods.description:
Required sequence of strings containing payment method identifiers for payment methods that
the merchant web site accepts
supportedMethods.title: supportedMethods

data.description:
A JSON-serializable object that provides optional information that might be needed by the
supported payment methods
data.title: data

PaymentOptions.description: Provides information about the options desired for the payment request
PaymentOptions.title: PaymentOptions

requestPayerName.description:
Indicates whether the user agent should collect and return the payer's name as part of the
payment request
requestPayerName.title: requestPayerName

requestPayerEmail.description:
Indicates whether the user agent should collect and return the payer's email address as part
of the payment request
requestPayerEmail.title: requestPayerEmail

requestPayerPhone.description:
Indicates whether the user agent should collect and return the payer's phone number as part of
the payment request
requestPayerPhone.title: requestPayerPhone

requestShipping.description:
Indicates whether the user agent should collect and return a shipping address as part of the
payment request
requestShipping.title: requestShipping

shippingType.description:
If requestShipping is set to true, then the shippingType field may be used to influence the
way the user agent presents the user interface for gathering the shipping address
shippingType.title: shippingType

PaymentRequest.description: A request to make a payment
PaymentRequest.title: PaymentRequest

methodData.description: Allowed payment methods for this request
methodData.title: methodData

options.description: Provides information about the options desired for the payment request
options.title: options

expires.description: Expiration for this request, in ISO 8601 duration format (e.g., 'P1D')
expires.title: expires

PaymentResponse.description:
A PaymentResponse is returned when a user has selected a payment method and approved a payment
request
PaymentResponse.title: PaymentResponse

methodName.description:
The payment method identifier for the payment method that the user selected to fulfil the
transaction
methodName.title: methodName

details.description:
A JSON-serializable object that provides a payment method specific message used by the
merchant to process the transaction and determine successful fund transfer
details.title: details

shippingAddress.description:
If the requestShipping flag was set to true in the PaymentOptions passed to the PaymentRequest
constructor, then shippingAddress will be the full and final shipping address chosen by the
user
shippingAddress.title: shippingAddress

shippingOption.description:
If the requestShipping flag was set to true in the PaymentOptions passed to the PaymentRequest
constructor, then shippingOption will be the id attribute of the selected shipping option
shippingOption.title: shippingOption

payerEmail.description:
If the requestPayerEmail flag was set to true in the PaymentOptions passed to the
PaymentRequest constructor, then payerEmail will be the email address chosen by the user
payerEmail.title: payerEmail

payerPhone.description:
If the requestPayerPhone flag was set to true in the PaymentOptions passed to the
PaymentRequest constructor, then payerPhone will be the phone number chosen by the user
payerPhone.title: payerPhone

PaymentRequestComplete.description: Payload delivered when completing a payment request
PaymentRequestComplete.title: PaymentRequestComplete

PaymentRequestCompleteResult.description: Result from a completed payment request
PaymentRequestCompleteResult.title: PaymentRequestCompleteResult

result.description: Result of the payment request completion
result.title: result

PaymentRequestUpdate.description: An update to a payment request
PaymentRequestUpdate.title: PaymentRequestUpdate

id.description: ID for the payment request to update
id.title: id

PaymentRequestUpdateResult.description: A result object from a Payment Request Update invoke operation
PaymentRequestUpdateResult.title: PaymentRequestUpdateResult

RoleTypes.description:
Defines values for RoleTypes.
Possible values include: 'user', 'bot'

ActivityTypes.description:
Defines values for ActivityTypes.
Possible values include: 'message', 'contactRelationUpdate', 'conversationUpdate', 'typing',
'endOfConversation', 'event', 'invoke', 'deleteUserData', 'messageUpdate', 'messageDelete',
'installationUpdate', 'messageReaction', 'suggestion', 'trace', 'handoff'

TextFormatTypes.description:
Defines values for TextFormatTypes.
Possible values include: 'markdown', 'plain', 'xml'

AttachmentLayoutTypes.description:
Defines values for AttachmentLayoutTypes.
Possible values include: 'list', 'carousel'

MessageReactionTypes.description:
Defines values for MessageReactionTypes.
Possible values include: 'like', 'plusOne'

InputHints.description:
Defines values for InputHints.
Possible values include: 'acceptingInput', 'ignoringInput', 'expectingInput'

ActionTypes.description:
Defines values for ActionTypes.
Possible values include: 'openUrl', 'imBack', 'postBack', 'playAudio', 'playVideo', 'showImage',
'downloadFile', 'signin', 'call', 'payment', 'messageBack'

EndOfConversationCodes.description:
Defines values for EndOfConversationCodes.
Possible values include: 'unknown', 'completedSuccessfully', 'userCancelled', 'botTimedOut',
'botIssuedInvalidMessage', 'channelFailed'

ActivityImportance.description:
Defines values for ActivityImportance.
Possible values include: 'low', 'normal', 'high'

DeliveryModes.description:
Defines values for DeliveryModes.
Possible values include: 'normal', 'notification'

ContactRelationUpdateActionTypes.description:
Defines values for ContactRelationUpdateActionTypes.
Possible values include: 'add', 'remove'

InstallationUpdateActionTypes.description:
Defines values for InstallationUpdateActionTypes.
Possible values include: 'add', 'remove'
